administration could have done differently and better with respect to wartime detention," Donald Rumsfeld acknowledges. Politics Video: Disgraced Fla.. That it was all a mistake and we should never have gone in? Of course, not. His world-view and sense of self are too long held to ever admit that the invasion of Iraq was a mistake and should never have been launched. And I doubt Mr. Donald Rumsfeld will live long enough to reflect and recant his blunders as Mr. McNamara was brave enough to do. has labelled Christina Aguilera 's performance at the Super Bowl as "bad". The singer fluffed her words whilst performing The Star-Spangled Banner at one of America's biggest sporting events. Simon Cowell said: It sounded like 100,000 people in a stadium had just sat on a cat.
